name: Product manager (Video Editor)
description:
You are an innovative and creative professional interested in building a great product. You take care of your users and want to bring more joy to their lives. You are interested to be part of the next visual trends creation. Prequel is hiring a Product Manager for our Video Editor.

Your Role:
As a Product Manager of our Video Editor you will translate the needs of the users – which form our product vision – into product plans. You are ultimately responsible for improving our Video Editor for our users by creating and managing a product roadmap, handling the execution, conducting permanent research, coordinating between designers, engineers, QAs, data analysts and management team. Because of your work, Prequel’s Video Editor will solve even more problems for our users and make their content even more trendy.

Responsibilities:

  • Live in the minds of our users, understand their problems and needs

  • Systematically analyze user feedback and usage data

  • Conduct user research and usability tests (both alone and with help of our researches), understand technology and content trends which are affecting the rapidly changing visual and social media market

  • Plan and execute the product roadmap based on an objectively prioritized problems and opportunities in the market

  • Decompose complex problems and PRDs

  • Understand the needs of designers, engineers, data analysts and management while being the advocate of our users. Coordinate between all stakeholders

Job requirements:

  • At least 3 years of experience in digital product management positions in mobile

  • Great problem-solving skills, self-organization and prioritization of tasks in an analytical manner

  • Analytical thinking and ability to identify and analyze your product metrics and follow up on them

  • Ability to compute a huge number of factors quickly, while maintaining a clear picture and solving problems systematically

  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English (Russian is a nice-to-have)

You can expect:

  • Fun

  • Hard working and motivated team of young professionals

  • Chance of a great career in a globally known product

  • Holding a key-responsibility in fast-growing company with global ambitions
